Sector.Name: Yiklerdanzh (Meshan Saga)
Sector.Credits:
Storm subsector was designed by Martin Rait for inclusion in Yiklerdanzh. Ultimately not selected, it was printed in the fourth issue of Meshan Saga magazine. Some of the material created for this verion was incorporated into the Wyld Worlds SubSector of the published version of Yiklerdanzh.

Data was transcribed and edited by Graham Donald
